title: Please Revisit David Rolfe’s Shroud Enigma Soon
post: “Cold and withering eye”? Moi? Actually this had been trimmed from David’s site when I visited. But, really. Warm and encouraging? Hmmm… Dispassionate and clarifying?
author: Hugh Farey

title: Please Revisit David Rolfe’s Shroud Enigma Soon
post: David has taken the page down and replaced it with a place holder page. Tip to everyone: If you put it out there Google will find it.
author: Dan
